title: Peyecoder: An open-source program for coding eye movements
notes: This work was supported in part by a core grant to the Waisman Center from the National Institute of Child Health and Human Development (U54 HD090256), a grant to Susan Ellis Weismer from the National Institute on Deafness and Other Communication Disorders (R01 DC017974), and a grant to Casey Lew-Williams from the National Institute of Child Health and Human Development (R01 HD095912).
